* Game Flow Excellence: Collaborate with the team to deliver snappy and punchy game flows.
* Leadership & Decision-Making: Set direction, prioritize tasks, and make critical decisions throughout production.
* Market Analysis: Research, play, and study slot games to stay informed about market trends and competitors.
* Game Presentation: Act as the interface between the production team and the commercial team.
* Release Facilitation: Coordinate with the operation and compliance teams to facilitate game releases.


**What You Need To Shine**
* Passion for Games: A deep love for gaming with strong analytical skills.
* Expert Slot Game Knowledge: Comprehensive understanding of slots from mechanical, psychological, mathematical, and visual perspectives. You should know what players will feel about the product and why it will succeed.
* Cross-Functional Expertise: Ability to work across all aspects of the product—math, development, art, music, compliance, marketing, and sales.
* Big-Picture Perspective: Proven ability to operate effectively at both team and studio levels, considering the larger strategic goals.
* Strong Communication and Organization: Excellent skills in presenting visions, plans, and feedback, while adapting effectively to inputs from others.
* Proactive and Accountable: Willing to take initiative and ownership of responsibilities.
* Language Proficiency: Highly proficient in spoken and written English.
* Regulatory Knowledge: Familiarity with casino game regulations and jurisdictional requirements.
* Developer and math background are preferred.


**Here's What We Offer**
* Holidays: 25 days/ year
* Pension Plan: Standard employer contribution of 4.2%, providing a secure foundation for your future financial well-being.
* Long-Term Disability and Injury Insurance: Coverage through Euro Accident, ensuring financial support in case of unexpected events.
* Comprehensive Health Insurance: Access to high-quality healthcare services, tailored to meet your needs.
* Health Care Allowance: Additional financial support for personal health-related expenses.


 At EveryMatrix, we're committed to creating a supportive and inclusive workplace where you can thrive both personally and professionally. Come join us and experience the difference!
   

  

 EveryMatrix is a member of the World Lottery Association (WLA) and European Lotteries Association. In September 2023 it became the first iGaming supplier to receive WLA Safer Gambling Certification. EveryMatrix is proud of its commitment to safer gambling and player protection whilst producing market leading gaming solutions.

title: Lösningsarkitekt
description:
***Som lösningsarkitekt hos oss har du en nyckelroll hos våra kunder, och du gör skillnad genom att omvandla våra kunders visioner och behov till hållbara IT-lösningar – vill du vara med?***
**Om rollen**
 Som lösningsarkitekt har du en bred teknisk bakgrund samtidigt som du förstår verksamhetens behov och utmaningar och kan omsätta dessa till funktionella och icke-funktionella krav. Du kan hantera och mitigera risker, samla intressenter, har goda ledaregenskaper och är en duktig kommunikatör.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du in tidigt in i projekten med uppgiften att förstå verksamhetens mål och behov för att omsätta detta till den lösningsarkitektur som ger mest värde till verksamheten. Du arbetar i tät samverkan med både expertkollegor från Capgemini och kunden, tillsammans med utvecklingsteam, produktägare och kundens övriga intressenter.
   

  

 Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande och spännande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas.
   

  

 Vi arbetar professionellt och metodiskt i en lärande miljö och både din teamchef och ditt kompetensteam stöttar dig och din utveckling som konsult. Vi träffas ofta för att utbyta erfarenheter, lära oss nya saker i en bransch som ständigt förändras – och inte minst för att ha kul tillsammans!
   

  

**Vi söker dig med**
* Flera års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt
* Bakgrund inom systemutveckling, och vana av att leda andra
* Erfarenhet av arbete med etablerade metodiker och ramverk för arkitektur och agil systemutveckling.
* Högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande
* Goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska


**… och erfarenhet eller intresse av:**
* konsultrollen samt av arbete med beslutsfattare
* att verka utifrån kundens perspektiv och förmåga att analysera och utforma arkitektur och systemlösningar baserat på verksamhetens krav, processer och informationsbehov
* molnbaserade lösningar, AI, säkerhet, processautomatisering eller integration
* arbete som lösningsarkitekt i komplexa miljöer, och/eller med lösningar baserade på Salesforce eller Pega.
* Certifierad IT-arkitekt


**Vi erbjuder**
* En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kompetens. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste tekniktrenderna och vara omgiven av duktiga kollegor.
* På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med starkt kundfokus, samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling.
* Vårt Digital Architecture-team i Stockholm består av ca 20 kollegor som arbetar som Enterprise-, Verksamhets- och lösningsarkitekter hos våra kunder.
* Capgemini har varit en dominerande aktör inom arkitekturområdet sedan 90-talet, med vårt eget ramverk Integrated Architecture Framework (IAF) och vi bidrar även aktivt till vidareutvecklingen av TOGAF.
* Vi har ett aktivt, globalt arkitektforum med lokala undergrupper där du kan dra nytta av globala och lokala experter inom arkitektur och även bidra med din egen erfarenhet.


**Våra värderingar**
* Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**Om Capgemini**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Senior Cobolutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Avdelningen ansvarar för både utveckling och förvaltning och arbetar i nära samarbete med affärsverksamheten. Som Cobolutvecklare kommer du att arbeta med nyutveckling, förvaltning samt livscykelhantering av system. Du ingår i ett team som följer agila principer och förutom kodning kommer du även att vara delaktig i analys, utveckling och design. Systemen körs på Mainframe.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Mainframe
* systemstöd
* COBOL


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 30-01-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Tech Lead
description:
**About The Role**
 We seek a Tech Lead experienced in cloud-based Financial ERP implementations to ensure seamless process flows during the implementation of our new financial ERP system. This role bridges IT, finance, and external vendors, driving change management and fostering new technologies and standardized processes.
   

  

 Responsibilities:
   

  

* Lead technical teams in configuring and implementing the ERP solution.
* Support integration efforts between the ERP system and other applications.
* Translate business requirements into effective technical solutions.
* Drive modernization of financial data and reporting ecosystems.
* Foster strong collaboration with key stakeholders.
* Manage change initiatives and organizational shifts effectively.


 Who are you?
   

  

 You are an experienced leader with a strategic mindset and excellent communication skills. You have a strong understanding of cloud-based Financial ERP systems and proven experience in large-scale implementations and change management.
   

  

 Qualifications:
   

  

* Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* Extensive ERP system experience, ideally with Workday or Oracle Cloud.
* Proven track record as a tech lead in large system implementations.
* Strong change management and stakeholder management skills.
* Experience with financial solutions, preferably within the insurance sector.


**Job Type:** 
 Full-Time
   

  

**Start:** 
 ASAP
   

  

*We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.*

title: Cloud & AI Infrastructure Sales Executive
description:
**Job Description**
 Do you want to take ownership of your sales success? Are you a visionary sales specialist with a flair for creative problem-solving and a customer centric approach? If you’re eager to shape the future of industries and make a tangible impact on the world, this is your opportunity to join our fast-paced, motivated sales team and discover unlimited opportunities to grow your career with us.
   

  

 Oracle is at the forefront of the digital transformation, empowering businesses with cutting-edge AI and Cloud Infrastructure solutions, encompassing both Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) and Platform as a Service (PaaS). We’re looking for a Cloud & AI Infrastructure Sales Executive to drive force behind advancing customer missions through the power of Oracle's comprehensive cloud portfolio.
   

  

 We have phenomenal career opportunities for every experience level and celebrate a culture of support and learning.
   

  

**Create the future with us!**
**What You Will Do**
 Engage in strategic C-level conversations to uncover cloud transformation opportunities while conducting indepth needs assessments and solution demonstrations.
   

  

 You will collaborate with technical experts to craft tailored cloud proposals and negotiate complex contracts and ensure seamless deal execution by:
   

  

* Evangelizing Oracle's Cloud Vision: Become a trusted advisor to C-level executives, demonstrating how Oracle's AI and Cloud Infrastructure solutions can transform their businesses and drive unprecedented success.
* 
* Leading Transformational Deals: Orchestrate complex sales cycles, navigating technical intricacies and securing buy-in from multiple stakeholders.
* Scaling Cloud Adoption Across Industries: Identify high-potential opportunities across diverse sectors, tailoring Oracle's cloud solutions to address unique challenges.
* Forging Strategic Partnerships: Collaborate with Oracle's partner ecosystem to expand market reach and deliver comprehensive cloud solutions.
* Being a Champion for Customer Success: Ensure seamless implementation and adoption of Oracle's cloud technology, fostering long-term customer relationships.


 Career Level - IC4
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Your Experience**
* Proven Sales Acumen: several years of enterprise software/cloud sales experience, with a track record of exceeding targets and closing multimillion-dollar deals.
* C-Level Engagement: Demonstrated ability to build relationships and influence senior executives across various industries.
* Cloud Passion and Expertise: Deep understanding of cloud technologies (IaaS, PaaS, AI) and their potential applications across different business functions.
* Technical Fluency: Ability to articulate complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Customer-Centric Approach: Unwavering commitment to understanding customer needs and delivering exceptional value.


**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s problems. True innovation starts with diverse perspectives and various abilities and backgrounds.
   

  

 When everyone’s voice is heard, we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before. It’s why we’re committed to expanding our inclusive workforce that promotes diverse insights and perspectives.
   

  

 We’ve partnered with industry-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work-life balance flourishes. We offer a highly competitive suite of employee benefits designed on the principles of parity and consistency. We put our people first with flexible medical, life insurance and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by calling +1 888 404 2494, option one.
   

  

**Disclaimer:**
 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer\*. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
   

  

* Which includes being a United States Affirmative Action Employer

title: Requirements management expert in System development
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Do you want to work in a technology-driven environment where your expertise in requirements management contributes to the development of next-generation systems? Our client, a global leader in innovation and digital transformation, is now seeking a consultant passionate about managing, analyzing, and breaking down complex requirements in a high-tech and safety-critical environment.
   

  

**About The Assignment**
 As a requirements management expert, you will play a central role in the development of systems driving technology for a smarter and more connected future. Your main focus will be to manage requirements throughout the development cycle – from gathering and analyzing stakeholder requirements to breaking down, specifying, and verifying system requirements.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Manage and break down stakeholder requirements to ensure they meet safety and performance standards for the systems.
* Conduct safety analyses (e.g., system impact assessments) and apply functional safety standards such as ISO26262 and ISO21434.
* Work cross-functionally to drive requirements management and ensure that system requirements are implemented and validated to the highest standards.
* Analyze and develop high-level system design, including defining interfaces, functional specifications, and performance requirements.
* Triage system issues and identify root causes through functional analysis and testing.
* Contribute to innovation by developing new ideas and improvements in processes and products.


**Requirements**
* At least four years of experience in requirements management within system development or related fields.
* Experience with safety-critical systems in industries such as automotive, aerospace, or equivalent.
* Knowledge and experience with standards like ISO26262 and ISO21434.
* A master's degree in engineering, computer science, information systems, or a similar field.
* Experience working in a large, matrix organization with multiple stakeholders.
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, as well as experience interacting with senior leaders.
* Customer-facing experience is an advantage.


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathianantu@vipas.se &contact me at +46760294155
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Cybersecurity Advisor
description:
**Om Tjänsten** 




 Orange Cyberdefense växer som en ledande IT-säkerhetspartner och söker nu seniora, strategiska generalister inom cybersäkerhet. I denna roll kommer du att vara en avgörande resurs för våra kunder i deras strävan mot en säkrare digital miljö. Du kommer att ha ett helhetsperspektiv och vägleda kunderna genom deras säkerhetsresa, med fokus på att lyssna på deras behov och vara deras rådgivare utefter deras behov.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 



* Inneha en central roll för teknikportföljen i Sverige och samarbeta på nordisk/global nivå.
* Arbeta tillsammans med våra tekniska experter för att affärsutveckla framtida strategier och koncept för våra olika leveransområden.
* Samverka med vår CTO och våra pre sales
* Vara del i kundteamen och kunddialogen i att presentera och rådge kunden kring olika IT-säkerhetsstrategier för våra kunder
* Hålla presentationer på interna och externa evenemang i Sverige och Norden
* Delta som rådgivare i säkerhetsprogram och kundteam hos våra kunder
* Tillsammans med vår CTO, vara del av att utvärdera nya partners och tekniska lösningar



  





  





**Varför Välja Orange Cyberdefense?** 



* Expertis och Innovation: Arbeta med branschens mest dedikerade experter och marknadsledande teknik.
* Flexibilitet och Påverkan: En arbetsmiljö där du kan påverka hur vi arbetar framåt.
* Challenger-kultur: En kultur som uppmuntrar nyfikenhet, innovation och kunskapsdelning.
* Stora Utmaningar: Möjlighet att säkra IT-miljön för stora internationella företag.



  





  





**Om Oss** 




 Orange Cyberdefense är Sveriges ledande cybersäkerhetsföretag med en vision att bidra till ett säkrare digitalt samhälle. Vi erbjuder ett brett spektrum av tjänster, från djupgående tekniska lösningar till mjukare tjänster som styrning och riskhantering. Med 3000 anställda globalt, varav 400 i Sverige, är vi stolta över vår mångfald och inkluderande kultur.
 



  





  





**Kvalifikationer** 



* Erfarenhet av strategiskt IT-säkerhetsarbete
* Teknisk generalist med förståelse och erfarenhet för olika cybersäkerhets domäner
* Van att ha ett holistiskt säkeretstänk och aktiv i omvärldsbevakning
* Affärsmässig och trivs med kunddialogen
* Vana vid att hålla presentationer på svenska och engelska
* Trivs i en dynamisk miljö med fokus på kunskapsdelning och innovation
* Kundprojekt kommer att kräva säkerhetsprövning, vilket innebär krav på svenskt medborgarskap



  





  





**Rekryteringsprocess** 




 Urval sker löpande, och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. För frågor, kontakta Fanny Westergren: fanny.westergren@orangecyberdefense.com.
 



  





**Bli en del av vårt team och hjälp oss att göra skillnad i cybersäkerheten i Sverige!**

title: Workforce Management Planner
description:
**Job Description**
 As a WFM Planner, you will join a dynamic Workforce Management team, collaborating with 5-6 other WFM planners to own and deliver capacity plans for your region. You will work closely with a dedicated WFM Analyst and be supported by a Global Planning Lead to ensure data-driven decision-making and optimal operational efficiency. Together, you will develop robust frameworks, analyze scenarios, and deliver actionable insights to help the organization meet its service-level agreements and cost targets.
   

  

 This role requires strong analytical skills, a proactive approach to problem-solving, and the ability to manage complex, multi-country capacity planning efforts effectively.
   

  

**Your Mission:**
* Create and manage long term forecasting, capacity plans and hiring plans for your region, covering multiple sites and approximately eight countries, ensuring customer support aligns with service-level agreements.
* Generate reports on performance metrics such as handling time, occupancy, shrinkage, and other operational metrics, transforming data into actionable insights to improve efficiency.
* Conduct ad-hoc scenario simulations and sensitivity analyses to ensure optimal resource allocation under varying conditions.
* Provide recommendations and drive changes to improve customer experience, agent well-being, and cost-efficiency, considering factors like contracts, skills, and queue setups.
* Lead planning governance for your region, including facilitating sessions with product, operations, finance, and recruitment teams to incorporate changes and produce actionable hiring plans.
* Regularly review and enhance the Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE) of forecasts.
* Co-own quarterly OKR target-setting with your Global Planning Lead to align with organizational objectives.
* Build basic data automations to increase the efficiency of Workforce Management processes.


**Our humble expectations**
* You have experience in forecasting, capacity planning, and scenario modeling within a Workforce Management context.
* You possess a strong ability to analyze data, develop actionable insights, and create detailed performance reports. Advanced skills in Excel or similar tools are essential; familiarity with BI tools like Looker is a plus.
* You can independently identify and address issues, even in ambiguous or unfamiliar situations.
* You have a track record of identifying opportunities for automation and efficiency improvements, with a focus on optimizing outcomes.
* You excel at managing relationships with internal and cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment and clear communication.
* You are adept at translating strategy into operational plans, considering customer needs, agent well-being, and organizational goals.
* You are a self-starter who takes ownership of challenges and drives solutions proactively.


**Next Steps**
 If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!
   

  

 We will be reviewing applications on an on-going basis, so if this sounds like an opportunity you want to pursue, apply today!
   

  

 If you have any further questions about the position before submitting an application, you can turn to:
   

  

 Laura Ilioaea - Talent Acquisition Partner
   

  

 laura.ilioaea@external.wolt.com
   

  

 Please note that we do not accept applications coming in via email. Please submit your application in English via our career page.
   

  

 This role does not include relocation assistance. If you are applying from abroad, you will need to be fully prepared to handle all aspects of your relocation independently, including securing work authorization (if applicable) and covering relocation expenses.
   

  

**About Wolt**
 Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants) and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 29 countries today, 25 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.
   

  

**So, why work at Wolt?**
**At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.**
 You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.
   

  

 We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.
   

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**
 We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.
   

  

***Join us today to build Wolt together.***

title: Business Development Manager
description:
**About XBP Europe**
 XBP Europe is an innovative, forward-thinking provider of bills and payment process solutions. Leveraging an EMEA-wide footprint and proprietary technology and services, we are backed by decades of industry-relevant experience.
   

  

 Bills and payment processes are increasingly omni-channel and paperless. That’s where XBP Europe comes in. Our offerings enable seamless workflows and frictionless transactions. XBP Europe combines physical documents, digital data, and instant messaging to help organisations work smarter. As part of that, we help to gather, process, and refine valuable data for use in decision-making.
   

  

 Our digital transformation solutions enhance efficiency, cash flow, and end-user experience. We serve a growing client list throughout Europe. See why organisations of all sizes choose XBP Europe as a digital transformation partner, visit our website at www.xbpeurope.com
   

  

**Job Description**
 Business Development Manager (Hybrid)
   

  

 Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

**Job Purpose**
* Deliver support to the Northern Europe Sales organization during the sales and bid process and act as the project (bid) owner in providing solution proposals, functional specifications and pricing estimates to meet customer requirements.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Provide alignment of proposal with Operations, Business Solution Group, IT and other departments involved e.g. HR, Finance.
* Analyze and reflect customer business requirements for both solutions and services we want to provide
* In conjunction with Sales team, provide professional presentations or demonstrations for clients addressing specific business cases
* Support operational/delivery excellence through precise requirements delivery for implementation of solutions/services
* Meet with assigned clients when needed and perform an initial assessment of a problematic or required situation to ensure comprehensive requirements are gathered for new opportunities good understanding of requirements and objective of customer.
* Engage with solution and deal teams to get business cases decribed and calculated
* Support new solution/service enablement by identifying potential business cases and defining matching services for the markets in scope
* Support business strategy to ensure customer and revenue growth.
* Ensure quality of bids and functional specifications
* Professional bid management (driving the completion of timely offer submission)
* Identify cross- and upselling opportunities together with Sales and Strategic Deal Teams
* Together with Business Strategy, identify and define new solutions and services creating new business opportunities
* The employee is required to undertake any task for which they have been trained, have suitable qualifications and or experience as deemed by a member of management.


**Key Requirements**
* A self-starter who can easily motivate themselves.
* Ability to lead and manage virtual teams to deliver quality outcomes within agreed timeframes.
* A committed, organised, confident, consistent and ambitious person.
* 5-10 years’ experience in customer management, presales and/or design of complex customer solutions
* Strong business acumen and technical aptitude in the markets and technologies XBP Europe is focusing on
* Business Development experience and aware of the future impacts of technology on business operations.
* Ability to quickly build trusting relationships with clients.
* Expert at uncovering client needs, developing compelling propositions and building comprehensive financials models and business cases.
* Excellent presentation and communication skills.
* Experience building hi-level customer relationships with both technical and business contacts.
* Evidence of flexibility and accuracy.
* A client centric and an entrepreneurial thinker.
* Good knowledge of Financial Services and operations, including use of its technology.
* Exposure to commercial situations and a solid background in transforming operations using a variety of tools and techniques.
* Recognised certs that evidence strong communications skills and numeracy.
* Excellent language skills in Swedish and English. Norwegian and/or Danish is beneficial.
* Willing to travel within the Nordics.


**Our Offer**
* Working in a dynamically developing international company at the XBP Europe with global standards and systems.
* Individual Development Plan and career growth
* Social package and employee benefits of the corporate level:
* Permanent Contract
* Referral Bonus
* Annual Bonus Plan
* Medical Benefits
* Holiday entitlement
* Pension scheme


**Disclaimer**
 XBP Europe prioritizes individual privacy and is devoted to safeguarding personal data. Our recruitment policy focuses on selecting the most qualified candidates based on merit and skills aligned with position requirements. Candidate information is handled in strict compliance with GDPR policies and relevant data protection laws. Read our GDPR policy here.
   

  

 XBP Europe is committed to creating a diverse environment. Qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to their characteristics or preferences. We provide equality, fairness and respect for all in our employment, whether temporary, part-time or full-time. We oppose and avoid all forms of unlawful discrimination including those known as protected characteristics.
   

  

 XBP Europe recruiters or representatives will only contact you by emails ending with xbpeurope.com or exelatech.com. We would never ask you for payment or ask you to deposit a check into your personal bank account during the recruitment process.

title: Design and Enterprise Architect
description:
G+D makes the lives of billions of people around the world more secure. We shape trust in the digital age with built-in security tech in three segments: Digital Security, Financial Platforms and Currency Technology. We have been a reliable partner for our customers for over 170 years with our innovative solutions for SecurityTech! We are an international technology group and traditional family business with over 14,000 employees in 40 countries. Creating Confidence is our path to success. Trust is the basis of our collaboration within G+D.
   

  

 We are the reliable partner for all challenges resulting from the Internet of Things. We offer a complete connectivity portfolio for mobile network operators, automotive manufacturers, technology companies such as chip and module manufacturers as well as transport and logistics providers. Our portfolio includes highly secure solutions in the area of connectivity & IoT, from classic SIM, eSIM and iSIM, to the associated embedded operating systems and life cycle management, through to services for global connectivity and IoT solutions. Do you want to actively shape the digital transformation with us?
   

  

**Give yourself an outstanding opportunity to develop and form career in a dynamic and international environment. We are now looking for an Design Architect to join us at G+D Mobile Security for a permanent position based in Stockholm.**
 Are you a technically skilled individual with strong communication and project management abilities? We are seeking an experienced Design Architect to ensure our products are tailored in a way that meets customer needs and expectations.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Streamline Processes: Focus on reducing time to market, lowering development and operations costs, and maximizing automation for efficient customer delivery.
* Service Deployment: Handle deploying services and managing processes, working closely with Service Owners and Design Specialists, and leading other architects in enterprise design endeavors.
* Technical Expertise: Act as the technical cornerstone of the team with in-depth knowledge of the company's products. Develop global end-to-end architecture, components, and common services. Evaluate and introduce new technologies, and create blueprints for efficient G+D solution and service roll-out.
* Communication: Present technical information in an understandable manner to non-technical individuals, including product management, executive teams, and sales personnel.
* Product Customization: Understand customer requirements and adapt our products to meet these specific needs.
* Stakeholder Management: Effectively communicate with various stakeholders within the organization and act as a link between different units. Collaborate with the R&D and Design N’ Architecture team on solution architecture and shared services. Work on a global level with teams primarily in Germany and Spain.


**Qualifications:**
* University degree in engineering or a related technical field.
* Minimum 3 years of experience in service design and/or architecture in the B2B segment.
* Strong technical competence in Service Design and Architecture and experience in a relevant field, preferably in the telecommunications or payment industry.
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to translate technical information into non-technical terms.
* Experience working with global teams and customizing products to meet customer-specific requirements.
* Ability to drive conversations and collaborate with different units within the company.
* Deep understanding of complex software and Enterprise solutions, IT, Cloud technologies, and Security Information systems, preferably within telecom.


 If you are a technically skilled individual with strong communication and project management abilities, we look forward to your application!
   

  

**What can we offer you?**
 In this role you will have the opportunity to work with talented people in an international and innovative environment. G+D is a well-established family-owned company at the forefront of the market. Besides a dynamic and evolving industry, we offer you:
   

  

* 4500 SEK wellness allowance/year
* 3 additional days off/year
* 1 sport activity hour/week
* Collective Agreement – IT & Telekomföretagen within Almega
* Benify Portal – Health activities and discounts
* Skandia Health Insurance
* Vacation exchange
* Hybrid office 50% from home (if you want to)
* Breakfast at the office every Wednesday


 Get to know us and our people a little better at G+D Sweden by listening to our Jobcast below:
   

  

 Shaping the next chapter of the digital ageSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/71GyhbDv090LgVyukyLf7v?si=f399b1f0d93e47e3Acast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e072f95211700118d82a4
   

  

 Our DNA is in our peopleSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/6BpWiUCMXr3q68dSGEr2w7?si=e4328a3c8db34b8dAcast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e070580b8d100110f0e95

title: Front Office Ambassador At Six
description:
**The Magic Starts At Six**
 At Six is a contemporary art and design hotel with 343 rooms and suites, including our Masterpiece Suite and 32 longstay apartments adjacent to the hotel. In the house you will also find - the wine bar Blanche & Hierta, At Six Cocktailbar and the large international restaurant Dining Room. There is also a gym, wellness and 3000m2 flexible event and meeting space. At Six is run by Petter Stordalen's hotel group Nordic Hotels & Resorts, together with the neighboring hotel Hobo, The Thief, Copperhill, Yasuragi, Villa Copenhagen, Sommerro, Kämp hotels and the American Line.
   

  

 Since its inception in 2017, Hotel At Six is striving to redefine and explore the meaning of luxury in a contemporary context. Today, we’re one of the leading choices for high-end travelers in Scandinavia. Our employees pride themselves in delivering products and services on an international standard, in a warm and friendly work environment.
   

  

**Do you have what it takes to deliver a great first and last impression for our guests?**
 Our Front Office Team is made up of bright and self-standing individuals who strive every day to deliver a true At Six Experience, 24/7, 365 days per year. We take pride in welcoming our guests and assisting them with all types of requests; from check in to check out and everything that stands in between. We particularly like challenging situations, love troubleshooting and delivering the At Six wow factor. Our mission is to redefine service at the Front Desk and be the benchmark department in terms of service for Stockholm and Sweden, you name it!
   

  

 Our Front Office Team operates around the clock and takes care of both our in-house guests as well as guests staying in our At Six residences.
   

  

 This is a permanent role which includes a 6 months probation period. The successful candidate will be working 40hrs a week and is expected to be able to work a variety of shifts including mornings, afternoons and weekends as well as Holidays.
   

  

**The Role and Our Philosophy**
 As Front Office Ambassador you are responsible for smooth running of the department during the day, supporting our Front Office Team with a variety of tasks, check in check out, taking care of our guests email inbox. The latter will connect you to a variety of responsibilities and tasks, which are linked to all the other departments within the hotel. This is a position that comes with great responsibility and flexibility as your main focus will be given to Front Office related tasks and a number of other duties which are connected to the whole Hotel operations.
   

  

 Our philosophy is that every detail makes a difference, and the differences make all the details.
   

  

**And what about you?**
 You have worked in either Front Office or Reservation and have at least 1 year experience using a well-known PMS platform (Cenium, Opera, Fidelio, Mews). Full command of both Swedish and English is needed. Driving License is desirable. In addition to the following, you should enjoy working in a fast paced environment and have preferably some experience working within the luxury segment of our industry.
   

  

 A go-get attitude will take you a long way, ability to work in an international team and environment is needed to succeed in the role. A positive mindset and having fun at work is a must!
   

  

 To recap, do you have all of the below skills?
   

  

* Previous experience within Front Office or Reservation Departments
* Previous experience working with the luxury segment
* Fluent in both Swedish and English
* Good knowledge of any well-known PMS platform
* Ability to work a variety of shifts including mornings, afternoons and weekends as well as Holidays


**Join us!**
 There! With all the mandatory stuff out of the way, let’s talk. Face to face, preferably. Apply below and don’t hesitate to send our Rooms Division Manager, Stefano Paganelli an email at stefano.paganelli@hotelatsix.com if you have any questions.
   

  

 Interviews will be held on an ongoing basis and the position can be filled before the last application date. So—what are you waiting for? Apply now!

title: Team Leader
description:
We are currently seeking a dynamic and experienced Customer Service Team Leader to join our team in Solna, Stockholm.
   

  

 In this role, you will lead and supervise a team of approximately 10 customer advisors and coach, ensuring they are well-trained, motivated, and aligned with company objectives. You will oversee daily operations, mentor team members, and drive high performance to meet organizational goals. Reporting to the Senior Customer Service Manager, you will collaborate closely with both local and global colleagues, fostering a positive and productive work environment.
   

  

 This is a temporary position for the period 01.04.2025-31.03.2026.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Your responsibilities:
   

  

  

* Lead and support team members in daily operations, offering guidance and assistance.
* Monitor and evaluate team and individual performance to ensure that targets and service standards are achieved.
* Conduct training and provide ongoing coaching to develop team skills.
* Identify and implement process improvements to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.
* Ensure adherence to company policies and service standards in all customer interactions.
* Motivate the team, fostering a positive and collaborative work environment.
* Efficiently manage resources to meet service demands.


**About You**
 To succeed and thrive in this role, you should have:
   

  

  

* Proven experience in team management within a contact center environment.
* Strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire, motivate, and guide a team to achieve high performance.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills for effective interaction with both team members and customers.
* Good organizational skills to manage time, resources, and tasks efficiently.
* Adaptability to handle changing circumstances and unexpected challenges.
* Strong conflict resolution abilities to manage team and customer issues.
* A positive, proactive attitude, especially in high-pressure situations.
* A customer-focused mindset, always aiming to exceed customer expectations.
* Fluent Swedish and English language skills.


**We offer you**
 At Fortum, we believe in a better future and want to be involved in shaping it. Our workplace is a safe place, both physically and mentally. You will grow with professional colleagues, being trusted and free to challenge yourself. We offer comprehensive benefits, flexible working hours, and hybrid work model to support your productivity, development and wellbeing. We are committed to build diverse teams where everyone feels included and is treated equally.
   

  

**Interested?**
 Submit your application latest on 18.02.2025 We start contacting suitable candidates already during the application period. If you have questions and would like to hear more about the position, please contact Tuulikki Honkanen, tuulikki.honkanen@fortum.com.
   

  

 To be selected for the position, the applicant must go through background clearance and a health examination including drug testing.
   

  

**We are Fortum**
 Fortum is a Nordic energy company. Our purpose is to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. We are one of the cleanest energy producers in Europe and our actions are guided by our ambitious environmental targets. We generate and deliver clean energy reliably and help industries to decarbonise their processes and grow. Our core operations in the Nordics comprise of efficient, CO2-free power generation as well as reliable supply of electricity and district heat to private and business customers. For our :5 000 employees, we commit to be a safe, and inspiring workplace. Fortum's share is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. fortum.com

title: (Senior) Data Scientist (Analytics), Merchant
description:
**Job Description**
**About Merchant Group at Wolt**
 Wolt as a platform focuses on serving three main groups: customers, couriers, and merchants. In a nutshell, the Merchant Group strives to make Wolt an integral part of our Merchant’s daily business. Their core mission is to provide merchants with self-service tools and automation that are useful, efficient, reliable, and delightful to use.
   

  

**About The Merchant Analytics Team**
 Merchant Analytics is an embedded analytics function within the Merchant Group. The team works to unlock insights related to the marketplace and turn them into actionable recommendations that drive the success of merchants at Wolt. While keeping merchants at heart, the analytics team focuses on all kinds of analytics projects that can benefit merchants while ensuring a seamless consumer experience and also supporting Wolt’s marketplace strategy.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Data Scientist at Wolt, your role involves diving into our data to solve crucial business problems. The scope of this role ranges from diagnosing problem areas to identifying solutions to designing experiments and ultimately influencing decision-making. This is a rare, operational, and actionable data-driven experience. When you join this team, you will be driving action from the frontlines, rather than just doing yet another analytics role.
   

  

**Our offering to you**
* The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
* You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki, Berlin and Stockholm, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany, Sweden and Estonia. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
* You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.


**Our humble expectations**
* Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
* 4-5+ years of experience in an analytics or data science position within an industry or research setting.
* Expertise in statistical analysis, including hypothesis testing, experimentation and causal inference using statistical software packages in Python, R, or equivalent.
* Proficiency in writing structured and efficient SQL queries for large data sets.
* Have prior experience building intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence business decisions, utilizing tools like Tableau, Mixpanel, Looker, or similar.
* Relentless pursuit of new ideas and data sources, and have the ability to systematically tackle ambiguous problems with a data-driven, hypothesis-based approach.


**Next Steps**
 The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!
   

  

 The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.
   

  

 For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)
   

  

**🎄Please note that we might have delays due to the festive season.**
**About Wolt**
 Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.
   

  

**Working in Product Development at Wolt**
 At Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.
   

  

 The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.
   

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**
 We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.
   

  

 Join us today to build Wolt together!

title: Data Architect
description:
*B3 Business Transformation stärker våra kunders digitala konkurrenskraft genom att vara datadrivna i sina processer, analyser och vid beslutsfattande. Med vår kompetens inom Advanced Analytics, Data Warehouse, Business Intelligence i kombination med stor affärsförståelse leder vi våra kunder in i ett datadrivet arbetssätt och möjliggör utveckling av nya digitala initiativ men även en förbättring av den digital förmågan och etablering av moderna arbetssätt.*
**Om rollen**
 Som Data Architect hos oss arbetar du oftast i team-leveranser mot kund men även som individuell specialist. Du är starkt involverad i en tidig fas för att skapa insikter om de affärsmässiga förutsättningarna, befintligt IT-landskap och informationsflöden. I rollen ingår det att arbeta självständigt men även att leda möten och arkitekturella initiativ. Din uppgift är att framgångsrikt driva lösningar i mål tillsammans med olika typer av kunder i olika branscher. Du arbetar med kompetenta kollegor där ni tillsammans formar en effektiv informationslösning vilket är en förutsättning för att skapa ett bestående datadrivet arbetssätt hos kunden.
   

  

 En ökad komplexitet inom våra kunders IT-miljöer ställer höga krav på våra specialistkompetenser. Även våra produktpartners kräver att vi håller oss uppdaterade om deras teknologier. Därför är det viktigt för oss att ge dig möjlighet att löpande utbilda och certifiera dig inom relevanta områden för att behålla eller öka ditt marknadsvärde.
   

  

**Om dig**
 Vi ser gärna att du har fem års erfarenhet av att verka som Data Architect samt relevant högskoleutbildning eller någon specialinriktad utbildning inom området. Du bör ha erfarenhet av både on-prem och cloud-baserade miljöer. Du har förmåga att lyssna och ta till dig kundens behov men är också en god kommunikatör som kan övertyga och skapa enlighet runt en lösning i en utvecklargrupp och bland sponsorer.
   

  

 Du har erfarenhet av flera olika moderna arkitekturer och lösningar för Databaser, Data Warehouse, Data Lake, Data Management, Integrationsplattformar och Analysplattformar. Du har även förståelse för olika typer tvingande regelverk och affärslogik som är relevanta för våra kunders verksamheter. Har du dessutom erfarenhet av olika typer av utvecklingsspråk samt god vana av att arbeta med agila metoder så är det ett plus. Du behärskar affärsmässig svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
   

  

**Du har kunskap inom några av nedanstående tekniska plattformar, lösningsmönster, verktyg och branscher:**
* Cloud-plattformar – Azure, AWS, Google
* Databaser – SQL-Server, Readshift, BiqQuery, Snowflake, etc.
* ETL/ELT – Data Factory, SSIS, Talend, Stitch, Wherescape, etc.
* SQL-utveckling/kodning
* Informationsmodellering, Dimensionsmodellering, Data Vault
* DevOps (CI/CD) - Jenkins, Git, etc.
* Power Shell, Python
* Domänkunskap: Bank, Finans, Försäkring, Fastigheter, Ekonomi, Vård och omsorg, Retail, Tillverkande industri
* Machine Learning i Python, R, Scala


 Det är inte viktigt att kravbilden matchar dig just nu men du skall ha en vilja att nå dit och löpande utveckla dig själv och tillsammans med övriga kollegor utveckla B3 Business Transformation till att bli en ännu bättre arbetsplats.
   

  

 Läs mer om hur det är att jobba på B3 och hur vi arbetar med vår wellness och våra sociala initiativ här.
   

  

 Klicka på ansökan eller tveka inte att kontakta Mats Erkers på telefonnummer:
 *070-539 47 05* 
 eller email: mats.erkers@b3.se
   

  

 Platser
   

  

 Stockholm

title: Prissättningsaktuarie
description:
*Är du analytisk och tycker om att jobba nära affären? Ta chansen att bli en del av Sveriges största aktuarieavdelning där vi jobbar mot våra 23 länsförsäkringsbolag som tillsammans utgör en tredjedel av Sveriges sakförsäkringsmarknaden! Vi söker en prissättningsaktuarie som vill vara med och utveckla vår motorförsäkringsaffär genom att implementera mer avancerad och träffsäker prissättning med hjälp av vår externa prismotor Earnix Price-It.*
**Om jobbet**
 Hos Aktuarie & Analys på Affärsenhet Sak kommer du att arbeta med prissättning och lönsamhetsuppföljning av länsförsäkringsbolagens motoraffärer. I vår pågående förflyttning mot en mer modelldriven och träffsäker prissättning behöver vi stärka upp kompetensen inom marknadsprissättning.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:
   

  

* Prissättning, marknadsprissättning och lönsamhetsuppföljning av motoraffärer.
* Prediktiv lönsamhetsmodellering och kundsegmentering
* Utveckling av modeller och processer för marknadsprissättning
* Implementering av prissättningsmodeller i Earnix Price-It.


 Länsförsäkringar är marknadsledande inom motorförsäkring och har därmed stora dataunderlag med god datakvalitet att arbeta med. Du kommer ges goda förutsättningar för att utvecklas tekniskt inom moderna statistiska metoder och få en nyckelroll i utvecklingen av Länsförsäkringars prissättning. Vidare kommer du att bygga ett stort kontaktnätverk med våra 23 länsförsäkringsbolag samt vara en del av en grupp som samarbetar, har roligt, utvecklar och stöttar varandra.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som har flera års erfarenhet av aktuarieyrket och av prissättning. Du har en examen inom matematik, matematisk statistik, civilingenjör eller från motsvarande utbildning. Du har goda kunskaper inom programmering där kunskaper inom Python är extra meriterande.
   

  

 Som person är du analytisk och driven. Du tar egna initiativ och har lätt för att identifiera vad som behöver göras och får det gjort. Goda kommunikativa egenskaper är viktiga i samarbetet med Länsförsäkringsbolagen. För att lyckas leverera till 23 länsförsäkringsbolag är det viktigt att du tycker om automatisering och effektivitet. Vi värdesätter en stark laganda och ser att du trivs med att arbeta i grupp och dela med dig av din kompetens till dina kollegor.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Pris Motor är en del av avdelningen Aktuarie & Analys där Länsförsäkringar just nu genomför en ambitiös satsning för en mer datadriven analys. Vi som grupp består idag av 10 aktuarier med hög aktuarie kompetens. Vi har ett brett ansvar inom Länsförsäkringsgruppens motorförsäkringsaffär, både privat och företag.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-02-18**

title: Business Development Manager
description:
G+D makes the lives of billions of people around the world more secure. We shape trust in the digital age with built-in security tech in three segments: Digital Security, Financial Platforms and Currency Technology. We have been a reliable partner for our customers for over 170 years with our innovative solutions for SecurityTech! We are an international technology group and traditional family business with over 14,000 employees in 40 countries. Creating Confidence is our path to success. Trust is the basis of our collaboration within G+D.
   

  

 We are the reliable partner for all challenges resulting from the Internet of Things. We offer a complete connectivity portfolio for mobile network operators, automotive manufacturers, technology companies such as chip and module manufacturers as well as transport and logistics providers. Our portfolio includes highly secure solutions in the area of connectivity & IoT, from classic SIM, eSIM and iSIM, to the associated embedded operating systems and life cycle management, through to services for global connectivity and IoT solutions. Do you want to actively shape the digital transformation with us?
   

  

**Give yourself an outstanding opportunity to develop and form career in a dynamic and international environment.** 
**Join Our Team as a Business Development Manager - Telecoms Industry in Northern Europe (UK, Ireland, Scandinavia, and Baltics)**
 Are you passionate about driving innovation in the Telecoms and IOT industry? Do you thrive in a dynamic environment and are ready to embrace the digital transformation era? We are looking for a talented and ambitious Business Development Manager to join our team and lead the charge in selling cutting-edge telecoms and Internet of Things (IoT) solutions.
   

  

**Abou** 
**t Us:**
 Giesecke+Devrient is a leading player in the Telecoms industry, committed to revolutionising the way communication happens in the digital age. We specialise in providing state-of-the-art digital solutions, connectivity and IoT services that empower businesses to stay ahead in the fast-paced world of telecommunications.
   

  

**Rol** 
**e Overview:**
 As a Business Development Manager, you will be the driving force behind signing up new customers for our digital offerings, connectivity and IoT services, which include SIM, eSIM platform, mobile connectivity, and tracking solutions. Your role will involve identifying and pursuing business opportunities, building strategic partnerships, and ensuring the successful adoption of our innovative solutions in the Telecoms & IoT sectors.
 **Key Responsibilities:**
* Strategic Planning: Develop and implement a comprehensive business development strategy to achieve revenue targets and market expansion.
* Market Analysis: Identify industry sectors and the key targets within them. Attend industry events and generate new leads.
* Client Engagement: Build and nurture relationships with key stakeholders, understanding their business needs and positioning our digital offerings, connectivity and IoT solutions as the ideal solution.
* Solution Presentation: Articulate the value proposition of our digital and IoT offerings through engaging presentations, demonstrating how they address the unique challenges of Telecom and IoT companies.
* Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product development, marketing, and customer support, to ensure seamless delivery and customer satisfaction.
* Sales Pipeline Management: Effectively manage the sales pipeline, from lead generation to closure, ensuring accurate forecasting and reporting.


**Qualifications:**
* Proven track record in business development, sales, or account management in the Telecoms/IoT industry.
* Strong understanding of digital solutions including SIM, eSIM, mobile connectivity, and IoT technologies.
* Exceptional communication and presentation skills.
* Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients and internal teams.
* Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities.


**What can we offer you?**
 In this role you will have the opportunity to work with talented people in an international and innovative environment. G+D is a well-established family-owned company at the forefront of the market. Besides a dynamic and evolving industry, we offer you:
   

  

* 4500 SEK wellness allowance/year
* 3 additional days off/year
* 1 sport activity hour/week
* Collective Agreement – IT & Telekomföretagen within Almega
* Benify Portal – Health activities and discounts
* Skandia Health Insurance
* Vacation exchange
* Hybrid office 50% from home (if you want to)
* Breakfast at the office every Wednesday


 Get to know us and our people a little better at G+D Sweden by listening to our Jobcast below:
   

  

 Shaping the next chapter of the digital ageSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/71GyhbDv090LgVyukyLf7v?si=f399b1f0d93e47e3Acast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e072f95211700118d82a4
   

  

 Our DNA is in our peopleSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/6BpWiUCMXr3q68dSGEr2w7?si=e4328a3c8db34b8dAcast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e070580b8d100110f0e95

title: Account Executive
description:
Build the future of the AI Data Cloud. Join the Snowflake team.
   

  

 The
 **Account Executive** 
 is responsible for building Enterprise level client relationships within the Swedish market. Individuals who excel at this job have the ability to prospect (via email, phone, & partner ecosystem), develop, and close business within a timely manner while focusing on the clients’ requirements. The AE’s must have the confidence and ability to negotiate and close agreements with clients and support new customers through our on-boarding process.
   

  

 This role is a unique opportunity to contribute in a meaningful way to high visibility, high impact projects at a very exciting time for the company. Snowflake is an innovative, high-growth, customer-focused company in a large and growing market. If you are an energetic, self-managed professional with experience managing a complex sales process and possess excellent presentation and listening skills, organization and contact management capabilities, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**AS AN ACCOUNT EXECUTIVE, YOU WILL:**
* Achieve sales quotas for allocated accounts on a quarterly and annual basis by developing a sales strategy in the allocated territory with a target prospect list, and a regional sales plan.
* Develop marketing plans with the marketing team to drive revenue growth.
* Be the trusted advisor to the customer by understanding their existing and future IT roadmap to drive the Snowflake solution within the marketplace.
* Prospect qualification and the development of new sales opportunities and ongoing revenue streams.
* Arrange and conduct initial Executive and CxO discussions and positioning meetings.
* Sales process management and opportunity closure.
* Ongoing account management to ensure customer satisfaction and drive additional revenue streams.
* Be familiar with solution-based approach to selling, have experience managing a complex sales process and possess excellent presentation and listening skills, organization and contact management capabilities.


**WE ARE LOOK FOR SOMEONE WITH:**
* 5-10+ years of full cycle sales experience selling software or cloud based applications to the mid-market
* Emphasis on cloud, databases, business intelligence software, data warehousing, SaaS is desired.
* Experience hitting quota of $1m+ of ARR per year and experience on averaging 8+ face to face meetings per week.
* A track record of success in driving consistent activity, pipeline development and quota achievement.
* Experience determining customer requirements and presenting appropriate solutions.
* Pro-active, independent thinker with high energy/positive attitude
* Excellent verbal and written communication in Swedish (native level), presentation, and relationship management skills
* Ability to thrive in fast-paced startup environment
* BA/BS required


 Snowflake is growing fast, and we’re scaling our team to help enable and accelerate our growth. We are looking for people who share our values, challenge ordinary thinking, and push the pace of innovation while building a future for themselves and Snowflake.
   

  

 How do you want to make your impact?

title: Senior Javautvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Vi behöver dig med en fullstackprofil, dvs du hanterar så väl frontend som backend och databaser, även om du sannolikt har en tyngdpunkt i backendutveckling i Java. Du har också erfarenhet av testautomatisering och kan bistå i hanteringen av de arkitekturfrågor som teamet behöver utreda.
   

  

 Hos oss arbetar du med systemutveckling i ett agilt utvecklingsteam där ni tillsammans ansvarar för teamets leveranser samtidigt som ni ser till helheten i tåget. I teamet organiserar ni själva ert arbete och jobbar tillsammans mot gemensamma mål i nära samarbete med verksamheten. Teamet är tvärfunktionellt och hjälps åt över kompetensområdena för att säkra leveranserna.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 8 års sammanlagd praktisk och aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av programvaruutveckling i Java
* Minst 6 års sammanlagd praktisk och aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av programvaruutveckling i Angular
* Minst 8 års sammanlagd praktisk och aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av GIT samt Jenkins eller motsvarande
* Minst 8 års sammanlagd praktisk och aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av relationsdatabaser
* Minst 4 års sammanlagd praktisk och aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av JMS och JPA


**Meriterande**
* Minst 8 års sammanlagd praktisk och aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av komplexa system med många integrationer i en komplex arkitektur
* Minst 2 års praktisk arbetslivserfarenhet av microtjänster i OpenShift eller motsvarande
* Minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Spring Boot och Gradle
* Minst 2 års praktisk arbetslivserfarenhet av att agera i rollen Scrum master eller teamlead.
* Minst 2 års praktisk arbetslivserfarenhet av storskaligt agilt arbetssätt enligt ramverket SAFe eller liknande


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 03-02-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: SAP Enterprise Architect
description:
**We (Westernacher Consulting)** 
 are a global SAP consulting leader, specializing in providing services related to business transformation, digital transformation, and technology solutions.
   

  

 As an
 **SAP Enterprise Architect** 
 , you will be responsible for defining and managing the architecture for SAP solutions on transformational projects. This includes aligning SAP solutions with business goals, ensuring seamless the integration of existing IT systems, and overseeing the overall design of SAP environments. You will work closely with business and IT leaders to optimize SAP capabilities and lead SAP transformation initiatives.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Architecture Design: Develop architectural governance, roadmaps, and implementation plans to guide the execution of technology initiatives.
* System Integration: Lead the integration of SAP with other enterprise systems and ensure compatibility with legacy applications.
* Strategy and Planning: Collaborate with customers, business stakeholders, and technology teams to understand business objectives, identify opportunities, and define technology strategies aligned with SAP's product portfolio.
* SAP S/4HANA: Design end-to-end enterprise solutions that meet business requirements, considering scalability, performance, security, and integration aspects.
* Technology Evaluation: Assess and introduce new technologies and solutions to improve SAP functionalities and business performance.
* Governance and Best Practices: Establish architectural guidelines and standards, ensuring compliance with SAP best practices and company policies.
* Team Leadership: Guide a team of SAP specialists, developers, and business analysts, ensuring collaboration and effective implementation of solutions.


**Your Skills**
* Experience: Minimum 8-10 years of experience in one or more Functional Domains with a proven project record in any of the following areas where you acted as enterprise architect: Finance and Controlling, Manufacturing, Supply Chain Management, Order to Cash.
* Knowledge: SAP Enterprise Architecture Framework and Toolset, and experience with BTP components and services such as application development, automation, data and analytics, integration, and AI capabilities.
* Education: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. SAP certification is a plus.
* Skills: Strong understanding of enterprise architecture frameworks, excellent problem-solving skills, and experience in project management.
* Tools: Familiarity with SAP Solution Manager, SAP Cloud Platform, and SAP integration tools.
* Communication: Excellent communication, influencing, and negotiation skills in Swedish and English (other languages are an advantage), at C-level.


**Westernacher's Promise**
* A partnership culture with a strong entrepreneurial spirit and the opportunity for partnership or co-ownership.
* Team Spirit makes the difference: People working together, drawing on one another’s skills and experiences, their diversity and spiritedness.
* Competitive compensation & benefits.
* An inspiring and exciting, innovative working environment.
* Environment of open communication, trust and regular feedback.
* International company culture and minimal hierarchical structure.
* Flexible working hours and hybrid working model.


**Interested? Then, don't hesitate to apply!**
**This Is WE**
 Committed to innovation, since 1969 Westernacher Consulting operates worldwide, with more than 1000 consultants in Europe, Asia and the Americas. We provide global business and SAP consulting, serving medium to large sized enterprises striving for innovation, operational excellence and profitable, sustainable growth. Headquartered in Heidelberg, Germany, Westernacher Consulting is the global leader in business process and technology innovation.
   

  

 Living, working, and operating in partnership. We are inquisitive, creative thinkers with a strong entrepreneurial spirit. We question new ways of working, think differently and are willing to try out new approaches to create value and innovation for our customers. All of this makes us pioneers in our field and keeps us responsive, quality-focused and results-oriented.
   

  

 Westernacher is a diverse work environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. Westernacher is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

title: Servicemedarbetare till MTR Servicecenter NATT
description:
**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Som Kundservicemedarbetare är ditt huvudsakliga uppdrag att på ett säkert och effektivt sätt hantera och kvalitetssäkra ärenden och felanmälningar som inkommer till Servicecenter. Du ansvarar för att på ett professionellt sätt och med förstklassig service hantera kontakten med Servicecenters kunder och samarbetspartners. Du arbetar självständigt med ärenden men samarbetar med och stöttar kollegor vid behov.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter är:
   

  

 Ta emot, registrera och sortera ärenden som rapporteras in till Servicecenter via telefon och e-mail från personal inom MTR.
   

  

 Övervakning av larm för stationer
   

  

 Ta emot och registrera sjukskrivningssamtal samt lösa vakanser
   

  

 Support för enkla IT ärenden
   

  

 Felavhjälpning av ärenden.
   

  

 Rapportera i ärendehanteringssystemet.
   

  

 Analysera och tolka rapporter
   

  

 Bidra till att utveckla och förbättra avdelningens rutiner och manualer.
   

  

 Tjänsten är på heltid och arbetstiderna är 22:00-06:00, rullande schema inklusive arbete varannan helg. Vi befinner oss i Hagastaden.
   

  

 Vi tillämpar individuell lönesättning.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Arbetet på Servicecenter ställer höga krav på att kunna arbeta strukturerat i många parallella processer samtidigt som du ger utmärkt service. Vi söker därför dig som har flera års erfarenhet av att arbeta med service i miljöer där det händer mycket. Du har god datorvana.
   

  

 Du är en person som gillar att hjälpa andra och är serviceinriktad. Du har lätt för att sätta dig in i nya uppgifter och har en god problemlösningsförmåga. Då arbetet innebär att hantera många parallella processer och ibland under mycket hög belastning krävs det att du har god stresstålighet. Arbetet ställer höga krav på kommunikativ förmåga, vi ser därför att du har en mycket god förmåga att kommunicera på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
   

  

 Vidare har du
   

  

 Gymnasiekompetens eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
   

  

 Gärna erfarenhet av arbete inom kundservice och telefonsupport
   

  

 Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift eftersom en stor del av arbetet innebär skriftlig och muntlig framställan
   

  

 Goda datorkunskaper och använder Office-paketet obehindrat
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Med oss på MTR gör du skillnad i människors vardag och för samhället omkring oss. Vi utmanar gamla sanningar och hittar nya lösningar för att utveckla oss själva och de samhällen där vi finns. Det har gjort oss till ett av världens ledande tågbolag. Våra värderingar är den röda tråden i vårt dagliga arbete: utmärkt service, ömsesidig respekt, ständig utveckling och mätbara resultat. De hjälper oss att skapa säkra resor, nöjda kunder och medarbetare som trivs. Vi är ett stort bolag vilket ger dig ett brett nätverk och möjligheter att utvecklas.
   

  

 Förmåner
   

  

 Som anställd hos MTR får du en rad förmåner, som SL-kort med resor i hela Stockholms län och Ticket Rikskortet till förmånsbeskattning. Förutom friskvårdsbidrag kan vi även erbjuda rabatter hos flera träningsanläggningar och företag inom friskvård.
