title: Project Manager
description:
We develop and manufacture turnkey energy storage solutions, based on lithium-ion battery technology. Our goal is to engineer technology that both stores and optimizes energy as we shift towards more efficient energy usage and renewable energy sources on a global scale. You’ll have the opportunity to work with exceptional engineers, scientists, developers and more to pave the way for the next big leap in the energy industry through our battery energy storage and optimization systems.

**Location: Stockholm**

**Tasks and Responsibilities:**  



* Create project plans and budgets for product development projects to meet goal and objectives.
* Secure resources (personnel and financial) to finalize project on time and in accordance with specification.
* Manage change requests associated with the product development.
* Lead and secure the quality work for your projects under research and development and those projects currently under launch throughout the business.
* Hold and document meetings with customers within the projects.
* Work with continuous improvement related to project (management) and process execution.

 **Qualifications and Experience:**  



* > 5 years of project management experience in a fast-paced environment
* Worked at a company developing complex products with both hardware and software that has its own production factories
* Experience in collaborating cross-functionally with different business stakeholders and team members
* Experience of full life-cycle projects
* Experience in active risk management and mitigation plans execution
* A track record of collaborating with steering groups and other stakeholders
* Possesses at least one of the following: M.sc or B.Sc. in Engineering

**Who are you?**


* Strong project management skills with proven ability to influence cross-functional teams without formal authority
* Deductive reasoning/ Analytical skills
* Proactive and anticipate needs before an emergency erupts
* Ability to manage up, down- and sideways
* You are passionate and pragmatic with a genuine technical interest
* You enjoy working in a fast-paced environment
You are a great team player  
* 

  

**How to apply:**


Kindly submit your application through the provided apply button in the advertisement on our careers page, as we are unable to accept any applications via email in compliance with the GDPR regulations.

**At Polarium, creating change in the energy industry starts with our team.** We believe a diverse workplace brings creativity, innovation and better represents our customers, and the many communities they serve, around the world. A positive work-life balance is what supercharges our teamwork and a sustainable personal journey throughout our careers.


Since Polarium launched in 2015, we’ve been on a mission to redesign the energy industry. We’re unlocking the massive potential of energy storage systems through our wide range of intelligent and digital services. Our passion for solving challenges is what drives our next generation of premium energy storage products in use on all continents and in all climate zones. Today, we power businesses, optimize energy usage, and reduce carbon dioxide emissions to create a cleaner future in energy.


We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Senior FileMaker-utvecklare
description:
*Vi söker en senior FileMaker-utvecklare för att förstärka vårt gäng! Hos oss får du möjlighet att bygga och utveckla din talang. Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av applikationsutveckling med Claris Filemaker.*
 Om oss
   

  

 Hos oss är personlig utveckling, frihet och arbetsglädje lika viktigt som ansvarskänsla och teamwork. Vi arbetar tillsammans och kontorsövergripande enligt agila metoder för att uppnå våra mål och tackla utmaningar gemensamt.
   

  

 Idag är vi ett växande team om ca 25 medarbetare som lotsar våra kunder i deras digitaliseringsresa. Vi har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm och Malmö och vi blandar kontorsnärvaro med distansarbete efter individuella behov och förutsättningar.
   

  

 Vi vet av erfarenhet att organisationer lyckas bättre med IT-stöd som följsamt och säkert anpassas till förändring och nya utmaningar. Vårt mål är att “Skapa tid för det som är viktigt” för de tusentals användare som använder våra lösningar. Detta gör vi genom att erbjuda smarta och kundanpassade lösningar.
   

  

 Vi jobbar både med egen produktutveckling såväl som kundunika uppdrag som leder till skräddarsydda applikationer för våra kunder. Huvuddelen av vår utveckling sker med hjälp av FileMaker från Claris, men vi har även ett team av webbutvecklare och erfarna driftstekniker.
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 Som en av våra månfarare jobbar du dagligen nära dina erfarna kollegor och med våra gemensamma kunder.
   

  

 Hos oss jobbar du brett och omväxlande med bland annat utveckling, behovsanalys, databassystemering, integrationer, automatisering och UI/UX.
   

  

 I detta fall söker vi i första hand en medarbetare i Stockholm.
   

  

 Om dig
   

  

 För att trivas i tjänsten tror vi att du har jobbat några år som FileMaker-utvecklare. Kompletterande erfarenhet av webbutveckling och utveckling av integrationer ser vi som meriterande.
   

  

 Vi ser framför oss att du:
   

  

* Har flera års erfarenhet av att jobba med utveckling med FileMaker
* Arbetar bäst som del av ett team
* Gillar att skriva kod som andra förstår
* Är ansvarstagande och hjälpsam
* Behärskar både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Är bekväm med att jobba både på kontor och på distans


 Det formella
   

  

**Anställningsvillkor**
 Heltid. Månadslön.
   

  

**Arbetsgivare**
 Square Moon AB, 556549-3292
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Känns detta som en tjänst för dig? Skicka in din ansökan nedan redan idag så kontaktar vi dig så snart som möjligt. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatumet. Vi kommer att genomföra en bakgrundskontroll som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.

title: Recent Graduated Engineers - Your future challenge starts here!
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*Ready to find your path? Try new things. Share experiences. And discover what you truly enjoy.*
 Saab is growing across the country and is constantly looking for new talent! If you are at the end of your studies or at the beginning of your career and want to continue developing while working to keep people and society safe, you are warmly welcome to apply to us.
   

  

**Your role**
 With us, learning is everywhere. A place where each day is a chance to discover something new, share what you know and learn from others. Here, you´ll get inspired by a bunch of smart and experienced people. Ready to dive in? You can explore different areas, find a new passion, and figure out your own path. Plus, we got plenty of courses and training to help you level up your skills. Grow with us, every step of the way.
   

  

 Saab offers diverse roles and continuous learning opportunities within IT, software development, systems engineering, electronics and mechanical engineering, just to mention a few. Start your journey as an engineer with us and play a key role in developing cutting-edge defense and security systems.
   

  

 There are several ways to work at Saab as a recent graduate, in a team as a junior engineer or through different introductory and trainee programs.
   

  

**Your profile**
 To be a successful employee at Saab, we want you to be a curious person who thrives in a supportive and friendly workplace where teamwork is the core to find smart solutions. You should be in the final stages of your post-secondary studies or a recent graduate.
   

  

 We believe that you have a Bachelor´s or Master´s degree within one of the following fields:
   

  

* Information Technology/System Science
* Computer Science
* Engineering Physics
* Electrical Engineering
* Mechatronics
* Mechanical Engineering


 Whether you’re passionate about creating secure and robust systems, developing innovative electrical or mechanical solutions, or engage in complex problem solving, we offer varied roles to match your skills and interest.
   

  

 This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.
   

  

**What You Will Be Part Of**
 Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.
   

  

 Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 22,000 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.
   

  

 Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here
   

  

 Does this sound like something you want to hear more about? Submit your application today!
   

  

 If you are interested in introductory and trainee programs, write a note about it in the application questionnaire. Selection and interviews will be conducted on an ongoing basis.

title: AI Engineer
description:
**About Magma**
 Magma is a startup that has quickly grown to become the leading platform for data-driven math education. By leveraging handwritten solutions in a digital format, Magma allows teachers to place emphasis on creativity in math, while gaining key insights into student progression. This creates a more engaging, inclusive and pedagogical math class for all students.
   

  

 Math remains the largest challenge for schools, where one in five students in year 9 are low performers. Math is one of the core pillars on which careers are built, and we believe that school math represents one of the largest opportunities at improving educational outcomes and career prospects for children and young adults.
   

  

 Magma is now growing rapidly across Europe and the US. We are an ambitious team on a meaningful mission of improving math education for millions of children.
   

  

 ‍
   

  

**The Role**
 As an AI Engineer at Magma, you will be joining the Data & Analytics team where our mission is to leverage data and develop AI models that bring value to our users. You will be working in close collaboration both within the team but also with the product development team building innovative features and bringing the future to the classrooms.‍
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Further development and optimization of existing data and AI features.
* Developing new features, leveraging our data.
* Drive and manage the development of data and AI features.‍‍


**Requirements**
* Technical skills and knowledge of data analysis, machine learning and data management (e.g., SQL).
* An academic background in technology, data, or a similar field – or equivalent work experience.
* A passion for solving complex problems and optimizing features to create value for customers.
* Experience or comfort working in a fast-paced startup environment where change is the norm.‍‍‍


**What We Offer**
* Creative freedom regarding methods and new project ideas.
* A learning environment, we are all excited to get better together.
* Play a key role in an exciting journey. We are a young company with ambitious targets and meaningful goals
* A dynamic and innovative work environment in the heart of Stockholm.
* Competitive salary and benefits, including pension, insurance, and wellness perks.
* The chance to work in a fast-growing company with a meaningful mission.
* Amazing colleagues who are passionate about improving education for children worldwide.‍‍


**Start** 
 : As soon as possible
   

  

**Location** 
 : Stockholm, Hantverkargatan 26

title: Gameplay Programmer (PAYDAY)
description:
We are looking to hire a Mid-Experienced level Gameplay Programmer to join our PAYDAY team. You will contribute across many different aspects of the game; be it player movement, weapon systems, sound implementation, AI, network, support systems, game state machines, controllers and more.
   

  

 Please note, this role must be based in Stockholm with a minimum of 3 days per week in the office.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Develop gameplay code across many different aspects of a game; be it player movement, weapon systems, sound implementation, AI, network, support systems, game state machines, controllers and more.
* Collaborate closely with our Game Design team to assist with implementation and feedback.
* Take responsibility for the features you are adding; bugs or design issues are addressed by you or communicated to the Lead Gameplay Programmer.
* Deliver a great end-user experience together with the team


**Requirements:**
* Experience in a similar GPP role using Unreal Engine.
* Basic knowledge of performance profiling and debugging.
* Familiarity with Perforce and/or other version control systems.


**Good to have:**
* Experience working with AI features, in particular behaviour trees.
* Experience working on an online coop/multiplayer game.


**Interview process:**
* 30m introductory Google Meet call with a member of our Talent Acquisition team
* 1h Google Meet call with our Lead Gameplay Programmer
* 1h Google Meet call with two members of the project from adjacent disciplines (i.e. Design, Art, Animation, Audio)
* 1h onsite meeting (for those that are local) or Google Meet call with our Head of Technology


**About Starbreeze**
 At Starbreeze, we believe games are more than just entertainment—they’re a way to bring people together. From the pulse-pounding, cooperative heists of PAYDAY to our upcoming Dungeons & Dragons adventure, we create experiences that thrive on teamwork, strategy, and the thrill of emergent gameplay. Our mission is to build vibrant games that offer infinite replayability, allowing players to forge their own stories and adventures together.
   

  

 Every Starbreeze employee helps shape this vision. Whether you’re crafting intricate game worlds or developing the systems that bring players together, your creativity and passion will drive the future of cooperative gaming. Join us in our journey to create innovative, immersive experiences that unite players and redefine what gaming can achieve.
   

  

 Starbreeze values diversity and inclusion, and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We welcome you as who you are, no matter where you are from or what games you play. If there are preparations or accommodations that we can make to help ensure that you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.
   

  

**What more do we offer?**
* Competitive salaries with annual reviews, generous occupational pension, and referral bonuses.
* Comprehensive benefits, including private medical insurance, annual wellness benefit, and 30 days of paid vacation.
* Unique perks such as free monthly office massages, weekly DnD club and other fun activities!


**Sounds good?** 
 Then we can’t wait to see your CV and look forward to meeting you. We recommend that you apply as soon as possible as selection and interviews are held continuously. Please submit your CV and cover letter in English.
   

  

*Recruitment agencies may not submit CVs through this website or directly to hiring managers. Starbreeze Entertainment does not accept unsolicited recruitment agency CVs, and will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with us.*

title: Full Stack Software Engineer - Golang
company_industry: Computer Games, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Software Development
description:
Cloud innovations change the gaming industry landscape every day, adding new capabilities, allowing new scenarios, and redefining the category. Our mission is to provide a reliable, and easy way to develop and operate game servers. Within EA, the Game Server Hosting group builds the important game server infrastructure that underpins EA's current generation of multiplayer games and fuels development of the next wave. We are looking for a Software Engineer to join the team driving our game server platform forward and help ship EA's next amazing multiplayer game.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




 Reporting to the Director of Engineering, Game Server Hosting, your primary responsibility will be to influence the architecture and design of our containerized software and services infrastructure, then guide the delivery of those designs. Most of your time will be spent working with your teammates, planning and creating high-quality services and systems that power and support EA games and their dedicated game servers. You will also spend time working with product managers and team leaders to propose new features and solutions to support EA's Game Server Hosting service.
 


* Develop creative solutions that address customer requests, deliver new features and fix defects
* Collaborate with customers and product owners across teams and time zones to create designs that balance priorities and requirements and can be broken down into clear execution plans
* Develop well-tested code that follows peer-reviewed coding standards
* Guide the debugging of complex and hard to reproduce problems and contribute to post-mortems for unsuccessful releases
* Communicate, and enforce our quality processes, coding standards
* Enhance EA's engineering capabilities through tracking of industry, segment, and technology transformations



  





**Qualifications** 



* 5+ years full stack commercial development experience
* Expertise with one or more web development frameworks - React, Angular, VueJS
* Expertise developing RESTful web services or gRPC services at Internet consumer scale
* 2+ years hands-on domain experience in cloud operational infrastructure and services
* Experience working on high traffic services and scalable systems, multi-threaded design with a complete understanding of an OO language
* Experience working within one or more public cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Firsthand use of scaling and technologies such as memcached, queuing
* First hand experience in all phases of a modern service development lifecycle, including requirement definition, architecture, technical development, debugging, testing, troubleshooting, product release, and live operation.
* Experience and experience mentoring other members of the team
* Bachelors' degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering, MS.








**Bonus Experience Points:** 



* Proficiency with Golang
* Experience with Kubernetes as an orchestration system for large numbers of workloads (1000+ pods in multiple regions)
* Familiarity with game engines and game software development processes
* Engineering Collaboration software - JIRA, GitLab, GitHub, or Confluence
* Active contributor to related open source projects



  





**We will also entertain applications from people who want to work remotely.**

title: Java Developer
description:
****The Role:****
 We are seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer with a strong Backend Java background to join our Player Account Services team. As a key player in a cross functional team of 10, you will contribute to the Customer Onboarding and Lifecycle area, helping us enhance the customer registration processes.
   

  

****Responsibilities:****
* Collaborate within the Agile team to deliver an exceptional customer experience.
* Develop and optimize event driven backend systems using Java, Spring, and other technologies.
* Contribute to the evolution of microservices that support customer registration.
* Embrace and promote our Agile values of open communication, trust, and continuous improvement.


****Technologies We Use:****
 ✅ Java, Spring, Spring Boot, JMS, JSON, Oracle
   

  

 ✅ Git, Maven, Docker, Kubernetes, Continuous Delivery
   

  

 ✅ Best development practices, Agile and Lean methodologies
   

  

****What We Offer:****
* A dynamic team of passionate developers.
* Opportunities to work in a diverse, international environment with offices across Europe.
* Access to meet-ups, training, and conferences.
* Competitive benefits including an wellbeing allowance, private medical insurance, and pension contributions.

title: Android Developer
description:

 **Android Developer** 
  to join our team!

title: System Test Developer
company_industry: Motor Vehicle Manufacturing and Industrial Machinery Manufacturing
description:
**At Tata Technologies we make product development dreams a reality by designing, engineering and validating the products of tomorrow for the world’s leading manufacturers. Due to our continuous grow Tata Technologies Nordics AB is now looking to recruit System Test Developer to join our team in Gothenburg, Sweden.**

 · System test execution and development based on requirements for internal-combustion
 



 engine control system

title: Sr Backend Engineer
description:
**Description**
*Join us at Palm, a well-funded, early-stage fintech startup, on a mission to guide the world’s money flows. As part of our founding team of treasurers, finance specialists, and engineers, you'll help build a world-class treasury management system for enterprises.*
*Are you looking for an impactful job where you can contribute to every single part of the product and company culture? Are you based in Amsterdam or Stockholm and open to mostly remote work? We want to hear from you!*
**About Palm Engineering**
 Engineering at Palm today consists of a team of five engineers with diverse engineering and cultural backgrounds. We are located in Amsterdam and Stockholm, mostly working remotely with frequent gatherings in one of our locations or at off-sites where it is warmer and sunnier 🏖️
   

  

 The engineering team has been working together since November 2023 so there is still a lot of opportunities for high impact work as well as playing an important role in further shaping the engineering organisation and culture.
   

  

**Palm Engineering Is Defined By Our Principles**
* Bias to Action: In the face of uncertainty, we prototype fast and often.
* Open Communication: We courageously voice concerns to realign our direction as needed.
* Passion for Challenges: We love the problem and embrace challenges.


 In order to achieve this we lean on a culture of collaboration and knowledge sharing, where curiosity, respect and openness are some of our guiding principles. We truly value diversity and are happy to have our perspectives challenged. And of course, let’s have fun together!
   

  

**Our tech stack**
* Backend (Web App): Golang, GraphQL
* Frontend: TypeScript, React, GraphQL/Apollo
* Data Pipelines: Python, BigQuery
* Database: PostgreSQL
* Cloud: GCP
* Version Control: Git
* We are continuously iterating and exploring technologies as we go - so there’s more to come!


**How will you make an impact?**
* Design, prototype, build and own new product features
* Build the backend for our data-intensive web app
* Integrate with third parties such as banks and ERPs
* Improve reliability, observability and performance of everything mentioned above
* Write unit and integrations tests


**Our wish list** 
  

  

* 5+ years of backend development experience
* Experience with SQL
* Being proactive and love picking up new things
* Able to find a good balance between quality and speed of development
* Able to collaborate and clearly communicate your ideas
* High sense of ownership
* Nice to Haves:
+ Python or Golang
+ Experience with cloud deployments & writing Docker configurations


**Benefits Of Working At Palm**
* Travel 🛫 Meet all your new colleagues at quarterly off sites - the last 3 were in Lisbon, Amsterdam & Berlin.
* Coworking Membership 🏰 Work from home is our go-to - we love spending time with friends and family instead of commuting. We have WeWork or Mindspace memberships for when you want to escape into the city.
* Stock Options 📈 Own a large chunk of Palm and reap the rewards as you help us grow the company to a global player.
* Pension 🧑‍🌾 Everything you need to not worry about life after work.
* Health Insurance 🩺 Best-in-class local insurances to help you get treatment quickly whenever you may need it.
* Wellness Stipend 💆🏾 500 EUR in annual wellness benefits - gyms, massages, you name it.
* Time Off 🏝️ 30 paid holidays for you to take time to recharge and relax.
* Homeoffice Stipend 💻 500 EUR to upgrade your home office


 Research shows that women and underrepresented groups only apply when they meet 100% of the criteria. We're not looking for perfection - if you're passionate about the role and have most of the skills, please apply!

title: Senior Gameplay Programmer (Unreal)
description:
* At Avalanche Studios Group we're always on the lookout for talented individuals to join our passionate team, but please note that relocation assistance is not available for this role\*\*


 Avalanche Studios Group is currently working on many exciting projects for our players. To continue doing so, we’re now looking for a Gameplay Engineer to join one of our prototyping teams.
   

  

 As part of this team, you’ll play an important role in contributing to the creation of immersive and creative experiences. This is an opportunity to be at the forefront of innovation and experimentation while collaborating with our talented engineering team to leverage Unreal technology. The person we’re looking for will be based in either our Stockholm or Liverpool studio.
   

  

 As a Gameplay programmer, you will work in our prototyping team and be responsible for driving core gameplay features, as well as collaborating with programmers and designers.
   

  

**What You'll Do.**
* Experiment with game design and use rapid prototyping while having architectural and algorithmic decisions in mind
* Work closely with design to create and iterate on gameplay features
* Optimise and fix bugs in existing gameplay systems
* Contribute with innovative ideas on all aspects of game development
* Work closely with your peers in a small, tight-knit team


**Who You Are.**
* Advanced knowledge of C++ and ability to code and architect gameplay mechanics and tools
* Experience using Unreal Engine in a professional environment
* Experience working on multiplayer features and understanding network replication in Unreal Engine.
* Gameplay programming experience from shipping at least one game
* Creative problem-solving skills where you like to think innovatively
* Good communication and collaboration skills


*Note: Research shows under-represented groups in the industry (especially women) might not apply to a job if they don’t check off every requirement. At Avalanche, we’re more about your drive to learn and interest in tackling challenges than what’s on your resume! So don’t stress if you don’t tick every box— shoot us your application anyway! Diverse opinions and different experiences are what make our teams so great, not itemized lists of qualifications.*
**The Stockholm location**
 Our Stockholm office is situated in Södermalm, the beating heart of the city’s game industry. It’s a physical representation of our games – the lush vegetation of Just Cause and theHunter: Call of the Wild meets corroded metal straight out of Mad Max. It has everything you need to make it your creative base camp.
   

  

**The Liverpool location**
 Our United Kingdom location is in Liverpool, a maritime city with a diverse blend of cultures and a plethora of museums, restaurants, pubs, nightlife, as well as a booming gaming scene. Liverpool’s storied history as a port city is ever-present, and within just an hour you’ll find wide sandy beaches, Chester Zoo, Martin Mere Nature Reserve, and the Southport Pleasureland amusement park. It’s a great city to visit and a perfect place to live.
   

  

**Our values**
 At Avalanche Studios Group, we create worlds beyond limits. But that’s not exclusive to our games, so we’re committed to developing a diverse and inclusive workplace. All Avalanchers have a shared responsibility to create an open work environment where everyone is treated equally and respectfully. Being part of our world is not contingent on your heritage, your gender, or sexual orientation. It’s all about your passion and creativity.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 To apply for this position, please register below and provide your CV in English. We review applications continuously. All further studio-related information is provided under a non-disclosure agreement.
   

  

*At Avalanche Studios Group we're always on the lookout for talented individuals to join our passionate team, but please not that relocation assistance is not available for this role.*

title: Technical Lead
description:
Are you ready to architect and lead the technical development of a transformational educational platform while growing an engineering team from scratch? At Kollin, we're reimagining how STEM students learn, with over 10,000 active users from Sweden's top universities. We're looking for a hands-on Technical Lead who will not only architect our platform but also build and mentor our engineering team as we scale.
 



  





**About Kollin** 




 We're a lean, fast-moving startup dedicated to transform how students learn at university. With proven results and an engaged user base, we're ready to scale our impact across STEM education.
 



  





**What sets us apart:** 




 - AI-first Approach: We're building advanced infrastructure for personalized learning experiences
 



 - Product-Market Fit: 10,000+ engaged STEM students actively using our platform
 



 - Growth Trajectory: Positioned for significant expansion by Fall 2024
 



 - Ground-Floor Opportunity: Shape our technical foundation and build our engineering culture
 



  





**About the Role** 




 This is a "player-coach" position where you'll both architect our technical future and write critical code. As our first senior technical hire, you will:
 



 - Own technical strategy: make foundational architectural decisions that will shape our platform's future
 



 - Build and maintain core features: spend significant time coding crucial features, from AI integration to scalability improvements
 



 - Create engineering culture: build and mentor our engineering team
 



 - Drive development process: establish best practices, coding standards, and development workflows
 



 - Be part of the company strategy: have a tight relation with the founder and the business side of things.
 



  





**Your day-to-day** 




 - Hands-on development across our full stack (Next.js, Tyescript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS)
 



 - Architect and implement AI features including LLM integration and RAG pipelines
 



 - Mentor junior developers while gradually building out the team
 



 - Balance immediate delivery needs with building scalable foundations
 



 - Make key technical decisions about our architecture and tech stack
 



  





**What we're looking for** 




 - 5+ years of hands-on full-stack development experience
 



 - Strong coding abilities across web frameworks (Next.js, Node.js, AWS)
 



 - Experience mentoring junior developers and knowledge sharing
 



 - Understanding of AI/ML (especially LLMs and RAG) or excitement to learn
 



 - Track record of making good architectural decisions
 



 - Comfort wearing multiple hats in a fast-paced startup environment
 



  





**Why join Kollin?** 




 - Foundational Impact: shape our technical direction from the ground up
 



 - Career growth: grow into a CTO role as you build and scale the team
 



 - Modern stack: work directly with AI and modern web technologies
 



 - Package:
 



  - Salary: 40,000kr/m with structured increases tied to company growth
 



  - Equity: 5-10% ownership with significant upside potential
 



  - Flexibility: hybrid (remote 2/3 days a week)
 



  





 If you're excited about both writing code and growing a team while making a real impact in education, we'd love to hear from you.

title: Embedded SW - Projects
description:
**Vi behöver din hjälp! Vår projektverksamhet växer och om du brinner för Embedded SW och vill vara en del av spännande, multidisciplinära (in-house) produktutvecklingsprojekt, där du får ta helhetsansvar för mjukvaran i inbyggda system, vill vi gärna komma i kontakt med dig.**
**Din framtid hos oss**
 Under åren har Avalon haft förmånen att samarbeta med en stor mängd olika företag och branscher – från MedTech och Heavy Industry till Food Industry, Consumer Products och Retail, för att nämna några. Rollen som utvecklingspartner och projektleverantör ställer höga krav på struktur, kommunikation, samordning, organisation och ekonomisk redovisning – utöver kompetens och erfarenhet.
   

  

**Vårt projektteam**
 Vårt projektteam består i dagsläget av ett tiotal mycket seniora medarbetare utspridda över landet, alla med sin egen specifika kunskapsprofil. Teamets syfte är att utgöra en stabil kompetensbas i de projektgrupper vi kontinuerligt etablerar för att möta våra kunders ökande behov.
   

  

 Tillsammans med våra övriga 150 skickliga kollegor inom Avalon skapar vi kompletta projektgrupper som täcker alla discipliner som krävs för att leverera enligt våra kunders önskemål.
   

  

**Din roll som Embedded SW-expert**
 Du kommer att vara teamets expert inom Embedded SW. Det innebär att du i din roll både operationellt och strategiskt kommer att ha en ledande position i allt som rör inbyggd mjukvara.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta nära våra andra projektteam-medlemmar, med särskilt nära samarbete med våra elektronikkonstruktörer, för att säkerställa högsta kvalitet och effektivitet i våra projekt.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig och hoppas att du vill bli en del av vårt team!
   

  

**Matchar vi varandra?**
 Vi letar efter mer än erfarenheterna i ditt CV! Vi letar efter dig som längtar efter nya utmaningar och vill ta en ledande och exekverande roll inom området Embedded SW i vårt team.
   

  

 Tre generella egenskaper är avgörande
   

  

* Du är en kreativ och innovativ lagspelare, vilket innebär att du är även väldigt kommunikativ och inlyssnande. Du jobbar hellre i team än för dig själv.
* Du är mycket van att arbeta som konsult i projektform. Vilket innebär att du är väl insatt i skillnaderna mellan att äga ansvaret för en komplett projektleverans och att arbeta som traditionell konsult ute hos kund
* Du är erfaren inom embedded mjukvara och kan förstå en problembild/kravbild och ta den via arkitektur, design, kod, test till färdig produkt/lösning


 Specifika teknikkunskaper;
   

  

* Du har mycket goda kunskaper i C och goda kunskaper i C++
* Du har mycket goda kunskaper när det gäller embedded Linux i form av byggsystem (yocto, docker, …), Linux kerneln (drivrutiner, anpassningar) och applikationsutveckling
* Du är trygg med baremetall utveckling i form av olika RTOS, MCUer och bussar (I2C, I2S, SPI osv)


 Övriga kunskaper och personliga egenskaper
   

  

* du är svensk- och engelsktalande
* du har ett stort intresse för såväl hård- som mjukvara
* du älskar att lösa problem och vill ständigt lära dig nya spännande saker


 Hoppas du tycker att det här låter kul, och känner att beskrivningen passar in på dig, då kan vi skapa en fantastisk framtid tillsammans!
   

  

**Vår kultur**
 Vår företagskultur är bland det viktigaste vi har. Vi är alla med och aktivt bidrar till våra gemensamma framgångar och vi motiveras av att samarbeta och driva vår affär framåt. Vår ambition är inte att bli störst, däremot kommer vi alltid sträva mot att vara bäst på det vi gör. Vi är glada över att arbeta på Avalon Innovation och kan stolt säga – jag är en avalon!
   

  

**Vad händer nu?**
 Vad kul att du har läst såhär långt! Har du frågor om oss eller tjänsten? Tveka inte att höra av dig. På grund av GDPR tar vi inte emot några ansökningar via mail. Rekryteringen pågår löpande så vänta inte med att skicka in dina kontaktuppgifter och bilagor.
   

  

**Vi som med STORT NÖJE ser fram emot din ansökan heter:**
 Jesper Sjögren, Head of PMO
   

  

**jesper.sjogren@avaloninnovation.com**
 Richard Kalberg, Project Operations Manager
   

  

**richard.kalberg@avaloninnovation.com**
 Varmt välkommen till Avalon Innovation!
   

  

*Vi har gjort vårt medieval för rekrytering och undanber oss därför kontakt med säljare av annonser eller andra rekryteringstjänster.*

title: Fullstackutvecklare med fokus på backend till vårt android-team
description:
*Vill du arbeta med något som på riktigt ger mening för människor, samhället och miljön? Hos oss på SJ får du möjlighet att förbättra vardagen för vår åkande personal på tågen och vidareutveckla våra interna arbetsverktyg. Du får bygga applikationer som är kritiska för verksamheten och som måste fungera 24/7. Vi söker en fullstackutvecklare med fokus på backend-utveckling till vårt android-team. Bli en av oss och var med på vår resa framåt!*
**Din kommande roll** 
  

 Du kommer att vara en del av ett socialt och DevOps-orienterat team som tillsammans arbetar med en utmanande och spännande produkt, våra digitala arbetsverktyg.
 



 I din roll kommer du att vara involverad i planering, prioritering, vidareutveckling och förvaltning, där vidareutveckling kommer ta upp största delen av din tid. Systemen som byggs används internt av vår ombordpersonal, förare och trafikledning för trafiköverakning, resenär- och personalhantering. Aktuellt i teamet är att vi vill bygga upp en egen kompetens på native android applikationer och du får vara med och bidra på den resan.
 



 Rollen innebär:
 


* Vidareutveckla våra applikationer med fokus på användarvänlighet, funktionalitet och säkerhet.
* Vi jobbar enligt devops-principer vilket gör det viktigt att utveckla förvaltningsbart då det är våra team som själva ansvarar för drift och övervakning.
* Att bygga upp en domänkunskap och förståelse för SJs interna digitala ombordverktyg.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste android-teknikerna, verktygen och trenderna som leder till att SJ ligger i framkant



 Hos oss har du möjligheten att arbeta med nya tekniker och ständigt lära dig nya saker inom utveckling.
 



**Förväntningar på den vi söker** 
  

 Vi söker dig som gillar att skriva kod och lösa verkliga problem, men som också vill bidra till att bygga upp vår kompetens inom native Android. Du trivs med att arbeta enligt agila principer och är en kommunikativ, driven och prestigelös lagspelare. Hos oss kommer du att arbeta i ett DevOps-team som arbetar efter devisen "You build it, you run it." Du kommunicerar flytande på svenska, både i tal och skrift.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet inom:
 


* Flera års erfarenhet som software engineer inom api utveckling med tjänster som hanterar frontendapplikationer på android native.
* Intresse för att arbeta med Android med en spetskompetens inom backend.
* Flera års erfarenhet av Kotlin och /eller Java tillhörande ramverk för native Android-utveckling.
* Intresse för apputveckling, samt en god förståelse för API-utveckling.
* Vi ser det som meriterande om du har en högskoleexamen inom datasystemvetenskap, programmering eller likvärdigt.



**Ansökan och information**
 Urval sker löpande så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Anställningen är på hundra procent och vårt kontor är beläget i Stockholm på Vasagatan 10. Vi erbjuder en hybrid-modell med möjlighet till flexibilitet.

title: Senior IT Engineer (m/f/d)
description:
At SoSafe, we're devoted to providing a safe and efficient environment for our team to thrive in. As we continue to expand, we are seeking a Senior IT Engineer who shares our drive for excellence and is ready to take on an important role in our vibrant and growing hybrid/remote scale-up.
   

  

**Your Mission:**
 As an experienced Senior IT Engineer at SoSafe, your primary mission is to empower our team members by configuring and delivering modern, effective and highly automated IT support services and operations. You'll play a pivotal role in designing and enhancing our IT architecture systems and processes, enabling us to achieve our mission effectively.
   

  

* The role can be conducted at any of our office or remotely from any of our European approved countries (Germany, Netherlands, UK, Portugal, France, Italy, Spain, Ireland, Austria, Croatia, Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Slovakia, Switzerland)


**Responsibilities:**
* Lead the administration and support of our Microsoft Azure Active Directory / 365 environment, endpoint management and security and other business critical SaaS tools in a hybrid organisation, ensuring seamless functionality and security and a great user experience.
* Collaborate closely with the system engineering team to analyze complicated technical issues, identify opportunities for improvement, and implement solutions and automations.
* Oversee access and identity management requests, maintaining security protocols and ensuring compliance with company policies and regulations, while speeding up delivery to end-user teams.
* Spearhead improvements to the IT onboarding process for new team members ("Safeys"), providing comprehensive support including laptop/phone provisioning and customized training programs.
* Serve as a subject matter expert in troubleshooting hardware issues for laptops, printers, phones, and other devices, offering guidance and mentorship to junior team members.
* Lead efforts to increasingly streamline and automate IT tasks and processes to reduce toil on the team, improve consistency and deliver a faster and better user experience.


**Your Profile:**
* BA degree in computer science, business informatics, or related field preferred; equivalent work experience will also be considered
* You care deeply about building and delivering a first-class user experience
* Minimum of 3-4 years of hands-on experience in IT Engineer or engineering roles at remote or hybrid scale-ups or technology-driven organizations, with a proven track record of success in handling complex IT environments
* Expertise in the administration of enterprise identity and productivity tools such as Azure AD, Office 365, or similar platforms like Google Workspace
* Knowledge in utilizing and taking care of ticket-based enterprise workflow management systems, with extensive experience in Atlassian products such as JIRA
* Desired experience in Mobile Device Management (MDM) solutions such as Meraki, Kandji, Jamf, or Intune, network devices and enhancing our capabilities in device management and security
* Strong communication techniques are essential. You should be able to articulate ideas clearly, document processes effectively, and collaborate well in a remote/hybrid team environment.
* Aptitude to work alone while staying aligned with team goals and time frames.
* A devotion to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace. We value unique perspectives and encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.
* There may be occasional travel to other SoSafe offices as required.
* An aptitude to mentor other team members is desirable


**Why Us?**
 At SoSafe, you'll be part of a cybersecurity team that thrives on innovation, safeguarding organizations against evolving threats and making the digital world a safer place. You will have the opportunity to make a real impact, surrounded by a vibrant and supportive team and environment committed to your professional growth.
   

  

**What we offer\***
* Work/Life balance: flexible hours, 33 vacation days
* Wellbeing and Financial support: Open Up, Corporate Discounts
* Coming together for moments that matter: annual company off-site, team events, local meet-ups
* And the list goes on: Learning & Development Allowance, Tech Equipment, Referral Bonuses, Dog Friendly HQ
* Perks and Benefits listed above are for full-time employees and can vary slightly by office location. These are just a sample; you’ll learn about more benefits offered during the interview process.


**About Us**
 We are one of the fastest-growing security awareness scale-ups worldwide. By putting people first and focusing on behavioral science, we are disrupting the status-quo of Cyber Security.
   

  

 Backed by strong VC funding by those such as Highland Europe and Global Founders Capital, we are looking for more motivated team players who will assist us with our ambitious mission and international expansion. At SoSafe, you will take ownership for your work and your growth, taking your career to the next level! If you want to have an impact and are looking to contribute in meaningful ways within an open-minded environment that values diversity and community, SoSafe might just be the right place to work for you!
   

  

 Are you our next Cyber Security Hero?
   

  

 Come work with us in our HQ in Cologne, our offices in Amsterdam, Berlin, Paris or Lisbon or at our co-working locations in Dublin, Munich, London or Chemnitz.
   

  

 Join us on our journey to make the digital world a safer place!

title: Microsoft Power Platform Developer
description:
Det vi gör på Tech har en avgörande roll för att förverkliga Apotekets affärsstrategi. Vi vill vara en ledande aktör i vår bransch och samtidigt kunna möta de behov som uppstår i samband med de förändringar som sker inom Apoteket och i vår omvärld. Som utvecklare på Apoteket är du med på vårt uppdrag att bidra till en bättre hälsa för varje individ – och samhället som stort.
   

  

 Vi letar nu efter en person som kan kliva in i rollen som Microsoft Power Platform Developer, där du kommer att ha en avgörande roll i att realisera vår vision. Du kommer att arbeta i framkant med Microsoft och vara med och utveckla plattformen hos oss på Apoteket.
   

  

  

**Microsoft Power**
**Platform Developer på Apoteket**
 Vi på Apoteket är på vår resa med Microsoft 365-plattformen och ser en enorm potential för utveckling framåt. Med en stark efterfrågan på nya applikationer söker vi nu en Microsoft utvecklare som vill vara med och forma framtiden för plattformen hos oss.
   

  

 Du blir en del av ett team som idag består av sex utvecklare där du kommer ha möjlighet att vara med och påverka och styra vart vi ska ta vägen med Apotekets Microsoft-plattform. Du kommer att arbeta nära hela verksamheten för att förstå behov och utveckla lösningar som gör skillnad.
   

  

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsområden**
* Designa, planera och utveckla avancerade lösningar i Power Apps, Power Automate och Copilot Studio
* Utveckla Canvas och Model Driven Apps för skräddarsydda affärsbehov
* Skapa integrationslösningar mellan Microsoft Stack-verktyg (M365, SQL, Dataverse) och externa system.
* Bygga custom connectors, cloud flows och desktop flows, samt utveckla lösningar med Copilot Studio-agenter
* Samarbeta med verksamhetskonsulter, projektledare och andra utvecklare och lösningsarkitekter
* Delta i kunddialoger och genomföra workshops och utbildningar


**Dina kompetenser**
 Vi letar efter dig som har en stark samarbetsförmåga och trivs med att arbeta nära både verksamheten och Tech. Du är analytisk, strukturerad och brinner för att leverera god kvalité i ditt arbete. För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har en hög grad nyfikenhet av ny teknik och en tydlig kommunikationsstil, vilket gör att du kan dela med dig av kunskap, inspirera och engagera dina kollegor.
   

  

  

**Utöver detta vill vi att du har**
* Högskoleutbildning inom datavetenskap, teknik, matematik eller motsvarande kunskap genom arbetslivserfarenhet
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet som konsult och utvecklare inom IT-industrin med fokus på MS SharePoint och/eller Power Platform
* Erfarenhet av att bygga Canvas och Model Driven Apps
* Bakgrund inom C#/.NET
* Erfarenhet av utveckling med M365 teknologier, inklusive SPFx.
* Erfarenhet av PowerShell scripting för M365 management.
* Erfarenhet av integrationer med olika Microsoft Stack-verktyg och externa system
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


 Det är meriterande om du tidigare arbetat med Power BI, Copilot Studio, React.js och SharePoint Framework.
   

  

  

**När det känns rätt**
 Fundera inte för länge. Låt oss i stället berätta om rollen och om verksamheten så kan du sen avgöra om det känns rätt för dig. Ansök nu!
   

  

 Vi vill att din ansökan består av ditt CV samt svar på våra urvalsfrågor. Du behöver alltså inte skicka med ett personligt brev. Urvalsfrågorna hjälper oss att bättre förstå din erfarenhet och dina kvalifikationer för den aktuella rollen och öka vår träffsäkerhet.
   

  

 Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum.
   

  

  

**Välkommen till Apoteket!**

title: Business developer intern
description:
Är du intresserad av att få erfarenhet inom affärsutveckling i en tidig fas av en innovativ och forskningsbaserad EdTech-startup som utvecklar AI-lösningar? Då vill vi höra från dig!
 



 Vi söker en driven och ambitiös affärsutvecklingspraktikant som vill göra skillnad inom utbildningssektorn!
 



  





**Om rollen:** 




 Som affärsutvecklingspraktikant kommer du att vara en viktig del av vårt team och arbeta med att identifiera och utveckla nya affärsmöjligheter. Du kommer att:
 


* Delta i strategisk planering och affärsutveckling
* Kartlägga affärsmöjligheter både i Sverige och internationellt
* Genomföra marknadsundersökningar och analyser
* Bygga pitchdeck och hjälpa till med investering
* Bidra till utvecklingen av vår affärsstrategi och produktlansering



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 




 Har en kandidat- eller magisterexamen inom affärsutveckling, ekonomi, marknadsföring eller ett närliggande område, eller studerar mot en masterexamen.
 



 Är analytisk, självständig och resultatorienterad
 



 Har ett starkt intresse för teknik och utbildning
 



 Talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och engelska
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder:** 



* En dynamisk och stimulerande arbetsmiljö i en snabbt växande startup
* Möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa AI-lösningar och bidra till utbildningssystemets framtid
* Erfarenhet av affärsutveckling och strategiskt arbete i en internationell kontext
* Flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet att arbeta på distans



  





 Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och vill vara med och forma framtidens utbildning, skicka in din ansökan till oss idag!

title: Senior Data Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**About Cognizant**
 Cognizant is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating, and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build, and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant (a member of the NASDAQ-100 and one of Forbes World’s Best Employers 2024) is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com
   

  

 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Data Engineer, a multi faceted engineer working independently from customer stakeholders and support the extended team at various delivery locations and work very closely with customer Business and IT Stakeholders.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Responsibilities:
   

  

* Project estimation, design, discussion, gathering client requirements, development and testing of various business modules, mentoring the team, and client deliverables
* Design and develop common utility frameworks using python, DBT and airflow.
* Data onboarding to AWS cloud.
* Common Data Lake Applications Upkeep
* Design and development of Pyspark, Spark-Sql and Scala applications, airflow pipelines, and Python Rest API applications
* Create SQL logic for data warehouse platforms like AWS Redshift and Postgres databases.
* Existing pipeline enhancements, bug fixes, and performance improvement activities
* Process creation and deployment for


**The Cognizant community**
 We are a high caliber team who appreciate and support one another. Our people uphold an energetic, collaborative and inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive.
   

  

 Cognizant is a global community with more than 300,000+ associates around the world.
   

  

 We don’t just dream of a better way – we make it happen.
   

  

 We take care of our people, clients, company, communities and climate by doing what’s right.
   

  

 We foster an innovative environment where you can build the career path that’s right for you.
   

  

**Our Commitment To Diversity And Inclusion**
 Cognizant is an equal opportunity employer that embraces diversity, champions equity and values inclusion. We are dedicated to nurturing a community where everyone feels heard, accepted and welcome. Your application and candidacy will not be considered based on race, color, sex, religion, creed, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, veteran status or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state or local laws.
   

  

 If you have a disability that requires reasonable accommodation to search for a job opening or submit an application, please email CareersNA2@cognizant.com with your request and contact information.
